heading: Hawezar Region Guide
content: is an unforgiving land. Its monsters are fierce with , and sometimes the scattered inhabitants alike. is this region's herb node to look out for . Traveling around the region can be treacherous, so be on high alert. is one of the best ways to boost your character's power! This is done by collecting , and more. See information below for all Renown categories for the region. Waypoints allow you to travel through a region much quicker than walking or using a mount. Knowing key waypoints can also help shorten travel distances, such as getting to World Boss Events. has 6 Waypoints located throughout the region. , which among many other benefits lets you easily find any Waypoint (and a lot more!) while tracking & saving your progression. Strongholds provide unique encounters that challenge you in different ways. These defiled grounds must be cleansed before any possible benefit can be taken advantage of. Once reclaimed, you potentially gain access to , Dungeons, and Waypoints. has 3 Strongholds highlighted below: Side Quests are optional quests that can be done during or after finishing the Campaign. Most can be completed quickly to advance your standing, netting you Each region has numerous zones for you to explore. While adventuring, an entire area is uncovered at once, rather than the traditional fog-of-war seen in past Diablo games. Seek out blurred patches on the map by walking there. Dungeons are great practice for their bigger brother - Nightmare Dungeons. They award a decent amount of (per first time completion) and unlock Altars of Lilith are hidden altars spread throughout the world of Sanctuary. They can give bonuses to your Life, Attributes, Increased Obol capacity, additional Skill and Paragon points! These help reinforce your build and power up your character. Each zone has a few special event areas. A few Zones can become overrun by at the top of the hour. You can face off against a in a special spot. Lastly, you can go after challenging for a chance at is full of dread, and its inhabitants are unrelenting in their pursuit of you. Get your up as quickly as possible by doing the following: Reviewed by
